</p><p>In 2018, O'Neal created the combination music festival, circus and carnival, <a href="/wiki/Shaq%27s_Fun_House" title="Shaq&#39;s Fun House">Shaq's Fun House</a>, in partnership with <a href="/wiki/Medium_Rare_(production_company)" title="Medium Rare (production company)">Medium Rare</a>, which is held annually.<sup id="cite_ref-286" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-286">&#91;286&#93;</a></sup> The event usually features celebrity DJs and performers.<sup id="cite_ref-287" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-287">&#91;287&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-288" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-288">&#91;288&#93;</a></sup>
</p><p>In early 2019, O'Neal joined the <a href="/wiki/Papa_John%27s" title="Papa John&#39;s">Papa John's</a> board of directors and invested in nine stores in the Atlanta area. In addition, he became the spokesperson for the company as part of the three-year contract.<sup id="cite_ref-289" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-289">&#91;289&#93;</a></sup>
</p><p>In 2021, O'Neal, among other high-profile athletes and celebrities, was a paid spokesperson for <a href="/wiki/FTX_(company)" class="mw-redirect" title="FTX (company)">FTX</a>, a cryptocurrency exchange. In November 2022, <a href="/wiki/Bankruptcy_of_FTX" title="Bankruptcy of FTX">FTX filed for bankruptcy</a>, wiping out billions of dollars in customer funds as well as O'Neal's personal stake in the company. He, alongside other spokespeople, is currently being sued for promoting unregistered securities through a <a href="/wiki/Class_action" title="Class action">class-action lawsuit</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-290" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-290">&#91;290&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-291" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-291">&#91;291&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-292" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-292">&#91;292&#93;</a></sup> In February 2022, the <a href="/wiki/United_States_Court_of_Appeals_for_the_Eleventh_Circuit" title="United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit">U.S. 11th Circuit Court of Appeals</a> ruled in a lawsuit against <a href="/wiki/Bitconnect" title="Bitconnect">Bitconnect</a> that the <a href="/wiki/Securities_Act_of_1933" title="Securities Act of 1933">Securities Act of 1933</a> extends to <a href="/wiki/Targeted_advertising" title="Targeted advertising">targeted solicitation</a> using <a href="/wiki/Influencer_marketing" title="Influencer marketing">social media</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-293" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-293">&#91;293&#93;</a></sup>
</p><p>In 2022, O'Neal premiered his halloween event in Long Beach called Shaqtoberfest.<sup id="cite_ref-294" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-294">&#91;294&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-295" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-295">&#91;295&#93;</a></sup>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Legal_issues">Legal issues</span></h3>
<p>In August 2010, O'Neal was sued by his personal IT technician, Shawn Darling, after O'Neal had allegedly attempted to plant child pornography on Darling's computer.<sup id="cite_ref-296" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-296">&#91;296&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-297" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-297">&#91;297&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-298" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-298">&#91;298&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-299" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-299">&#91;299&#93;</a></sup> Darling claimed that O'Neal had originally tried to protect himself by hacking his mistresses' voicemails and deleting relevant messages. Darling also alleged that O'Neal had used law enforcement contacts to obtain restricted information on those mistresses, and that O'Neal subsequently threw his laptop into a lake to destroy possible evidence.<sup id="cite_ref-300" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-300">&#91;300&#93;</a></sup> In 2017, a trial court ruled that Darling had not filed the lawsuit "in good faith," and that the accusations made by Darling occurred after he had attempted to extort&#160;$12,000,000 from O’Neal in return for thousands of stolen emails and electronic files.<sup id="cite_ref-:0_301-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-:0-301">&#91;301&#93;</a></sup> Throughout the trial, Darling failed to submit adequate evidence to back up his claims. In 2021, the litigation ended with a court ruling that O'Neal was entitled to $412,914.50 in legal fees.<sup id="cite_ref-:0_301-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-:0-301">&#91;301&#93;</a></sup>
</p><p>In April 2014, O'Neal posted a photo on Instagram that showed himself mocking Jahmel Binion who suffers from <a href="/wiki/Ectodermal_dysplasia" title="Ectodermal dysplasia">Ectodermal dysplasia</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-HARTMAN_302-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HARTMAN-302">&#91;302&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-303" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-303">&#91;303&#93;</a></sup> O'Neal issued a public apology, stating that he and Binion had spoken and that he's "made a friend today".<sup id="cite_ref-HARTMAN_302-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HARTMAN-302">&#91;302&#93;</a></sup> Binion would however go on to sue O'Neal for a sum larger than $25,000.<sup id="cite_ref-HARTMAN_302-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HARTMAN-302">&#91;302&#93;</a></sup> In 2016, Binion withdrew the lawsuit after coming to a settlement agreement with O'Neal.<sup id="cite_ref-304" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-304">&#91;304&#93;</a></sup>
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Personal_life">Personal life</span></h2>
<figure class="mw-default-size" typeof="mw:File/Thumb"><a href="/wiki/File:Shaq_@NBA_All_star_game.jpg" class="mw-file-description"><img src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/38/Shaq_%40NBA_All_star_game.jpg/220px-Shaq_%40NBA_All_star_game.jpg" decoding="async" width="220" height="186" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/38/Shaq_%40NBA_All_star_game.jpg/330px-Shaq_%40NBA_All_star_game.jpg 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/38/Shaq_%40NBA_All_star_game.jpg/440px-Shaq_%40NBA_All_star_game.jpg 2x" data-file-width="827" data-file-height="701" /></a><figcaption>O'Neal at the 2009 NBA All-Star game</figcaption></figure>
<p>O'Neal was raised by a <a href="/wiki/Baptist" class="mw-redirect" title="Baptist">Baptist</a> mother and a <a href="/wiki/Muslim" class="mw-redirect" title="Muslim">Muslim</a> stepfather and said that they taught him both.<sup id="cite_ref-BH2018_305-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-BH2018-305">&#91;305&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-SI2022_306-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-SI2022-306">&#91;306&#93;</a></sup> Both <a href="/wiki/Robin_Wright_(author)" title="Robin Wright (author)">Robin Wright</a> in her book <i>Rock the Casbah</i> as well as the <i><a href="/wiki/Los_Angeles_Times" title="Los Angeles Times">Los Angeles Times</a></i> have identified O'Neal as a Muslim.<sup id="cite_ref-307" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-307">&#91;307&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-308" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-308">&#91;308&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-309" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-309">&#91;309&#93;</a></sup> However, O'Neal has said, "I'm Muslim, I'm Jewish, I'm Buddhist, I'm everybody 'cause I'm a people person."<sup id="cite_ref-310" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-310">&#91;310&#93;</a></sup>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Marriage_and_children">Marriage and children</span></h3>
<p>O'Neal married <a href="/wiki/Shaunie_O%27Neal" title="Shaunie O&#39;Neal">Shaunie Nelson</a> on December 26, 2002. The couple have four children: <a href="/wiki/Shareef_O%27Neal" title="Shareef O&#39;Neal">Shareef</a> (b. January 11, 2000), Amirah (b. November 13, 2001), Shaqir (b. April 19, 2003),<sup id="cite_ref-311" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-311">&#91;311&#93;</a></sup> and Me'arah (b. May 1, 2006).<sup id="cite_ref-312" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-312">&#91;312&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-313" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-313">&#91;313&#93;</a></sup> Nelson also has one son from a previous relationship, Myles. O'Neal has a daughter named Taahirah O'Neal (b. July 19, 1996)<sup id="cite_ref-314" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-314">&#91;314&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-315" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-315">&#91;315&#93;</a></sup> from a previous relationship with his ex-girlfriend Arnetta Yardbourgh.<sup id="cite_ref-316" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-316">&#91;316&#93;</a></sup>
</p><p>On September 4, 2007, O'Neal filed for divorce from Shaunie in a Miami-Dade Circuit court. Shaunie later said that the couple was back together and that the divorce was withdrawn. However, on November 10, 2009, Shaunie filed an intent to divorce, citing irreconcilable differences.<sup id="cite_ref-317" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-317">&#91;317&#93;</a></sup> The divorce was finalized in 2011. Shaq blames himself for the failed marriage and says he made mistakes and was "greedy."<sup id="cite_ref-318" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-318">&#91;318&#93;</a></sup>
</p><p>In 2015, Shareef was seen in high school basketball highlights as a 6-foot-7-inch (2.01&#160;m) freshman power forward, and had been described to have "polar opposite playing style to his father" due to his more athletic build and better shooting range.<sup id="cite_ref-319" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-319">&#91;319&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-320" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-320">&#91;320&#93;</a></sup> Shareef played in college for the <a href="/wiki/UCLA_Bruins_men%27s_basketball" title="UCLA Bruins men&#39;s basketball">UCLA Bruins</a> before transferring to LSU.<sup id="cite_ref-321" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-321">&#91;321&#93;</a></sup>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Post-marriage_relationships">Post-marriage relationships</span></h3>
<p>In summer 2010, O'Neal began dating reality TV star <a href="/wiki/Nicole_Alexander" title="Nicole Alexander">Nicole "Hoopz" Alexander</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-Globe_322-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Globe-322">&#91;322&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-323" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-323">&#91;323&#93;</a></sup> The couple resided at O'Neal's home in <a href="/wiki/Sudbury,_Massachusetts" title="Sudbury, Massachusetts">Sudbury, Massachusetts</a>,<sup id="cite_ref-324" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-324">&#91;324&#93;</a></sup> and later split in August 2012.<sup id="cite_ref-325" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-325">&#91;325&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-326" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-326">&#91;326&#93;</a></sup>
</p><p>O'Neal began dating Laticia Rolle, a model, originally from <a href="/wiki/Gardner,_Massachusetts" title="Gardner, Massachusetts">Gardner, Massachusetts</a>, in early 2014.<sup id="cite_ref-327" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-327">&#91;327&#93;</a></sup> They later split in March 2018.<sup id="cite_ref-328" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-328">&#91;328&#93;</a></sup>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Outside_of_basketball">Outside of basketball</span></h3>
<figure class="mw-default-size" typeof="mw:File/Thumb"><a href="/wiki/File:Shaquille_O%27Neal_in_2011.jpg" class="mw-file-description"><img src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/ad/Shaquille_O%27Neal_in_2011.jpg/220px-Shaquille_O%27Neal_in_2011.jpg" decoding="async" width="220" height="293" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/ad/Shaquille_O%27Neal_in_2011.jpg/330px-Shaquille_O%27Neal_in_2011.jpg 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/ad/Shaquille_O%27Neal_in_2011.jpg/440px-Shaquille_O%27Neal_in_2011.jpg 2x" data-file-width="816" data-file-height="1088" /></a><figcaption>O'Neal in 2011</figcaption></figure>
<p>In June 2005 when Hall of Fame center <a href="/wiki/George_Mikan" title="George Mikan">George Mikan</a> died, O'Neal, who considered Mikan to be a major influence, extended an offer to his family to pay all of the funeral expenses, which they accepted.<sup id="cite_ref-329" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-329">&#91;329&#93;</a></sup>
</p><p>O'Neal is a member of <a href="/wiki/Omega_Psi_Phi" title="Omega Psi Phi">Omega Psi Phi</a> fraternity.
</p><p>O'Neal is a 2009 inductee of the <a href="/wiki/New_Jersey_Hall_of_Fame" title="New Jersey Hall of Fame">New Jersey Hall of Fame</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-330" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-330">&#91;330&#93;</a></sup> O'Neal became a <a href="/wiki/Freemason" class="mw-redirect" title="Freemason">Freemason</a> in 2011, becoming a member of Widow's Son Lodge No. 28 in Boston.<sup id="cite_ref-331" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-331">&#91;331&#93;</a></sup> O'Neal is a <a href="/wiki/Prince_Hall_Freemasonry" title="Prince Hall Freemasonry">Prince Hall</a> <a href="/wiki/Freemason" class="mw-redirect" title="Freemason">Freemason</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-332" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-332">&#91;332&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-333" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-333">&#91;333&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-334" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-334">&#91;334&#93;</a></sup>
</p><p>On January 31, 2012, O'Neal was honored as one of the <a href="/wiki/McDonald%27s_All-American_Game#35_Greatest_Boys_McDonald&#39;s_All_Americans" title="McDonald&#39;s All-American Game">35 Greatest McDonald's All-Americans</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-335" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-335">&#91;335&#93;</a></sup>
</p><p>O'Neal's stepfather, Philip Arthur Harrison, died of a heart attack on September 10, 2013.<sup id="cite_ref-336" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-336">&#91;336&#93;</a></sup>
</p><p>O'Neal is a fan of the <a href="/wiki/National_Hockey_League" title="National Hockey League">National Hockey League</a>'s <a href="/wiki/New_Jersey_Devils" title="New Jersey Devils">New Jersey Devils</a>, who play in his hometown of Newark, and has been seen at several games over the years.<sup id="cite_ref-337" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-337">&#91;337&#93;</a></sup> On January 11, 2014, O'Neal performed the <a href="/wiki/Ceremonial_puck_drop" class="mw-redirect" title="Ceremonial puck drop">ceremonial first puck</a> and drove a <a href="/wiki/Ice_resurfacer" title="Ice resurfacer">Zamboni</a> for a game between the Devils and the <a href="/wiki/Florida_Panthers" title="Florida Panthers">Florida Panthers</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-338" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-338">&#91;338&#93;</a></sup> O'Neal is also a fan of English <a href="/wiki/Association_football" title="Association football">football</a> club <a href="/wiki/Northampton_Town_F.C." title="Northampton Town F.C.">Northampton Town</a>, and has posted videos of support to their official <a href="/wiki/YouTube" title="YouTube">YouTube</a> page.<sup id="cite_ref-339" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-339">&#91;339&#93;</a></sup>
</p><p>O’Neal is a fan of <a href="/wiki/National_Football_League" title="National Football League">National Football League</a>’s <a href="/wiki/Dallas_Cowboys" title="Dallas Cowboys">Dallas Cowboys</a>. According to him, football was actually his first sport and he wants to be like his idol, <a href="/wiki/Ed_%22Too_Tall%22_Jones" title="Ed &quot;Too Tall&quot; Jones">Ed "Too Tall" Jones</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-340" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-340">&#91;340&#93;</a></sup>
</p><p>In 2016, O'Neal purchased a 14.3-acre, two-house compound in <a href="/wiki/McDonough,_Georgia" title="McDonough, Georgia">McDonough, Georgia</a> for $1.15 million. It is around 30 miles southeast of <a href="/wiki/Atlanta" title="Atlanta">Atlanta</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-341" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-341">&#91;341&#93;</a></sup>
</p><p>O'Neal endorsed <a href="/wiki/Republican_Party_of_the_United_States" class="mw-redirect" title="Republican Party of the United States">Republican</a> <a href="/wiki/New_Jersey" title="New Jersey">New Jersey</a> governor <a href="/wiki/Chris_Christie" title="Chris Christie">Chris Christie</a> in his 2013 <a href="/wiki/2013_New_Jersey_gubernatorial_election" title="2013 New Jersey gubernatorial election">reelection bid</a>, appearing in a television advertisement.<sup id="cite_ref-342" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-342">&#91;342&#93;</a></sup> He participated in a virtual rally for then-presidential candidate <a href="/wiki/Joe_Biden" title="Joe Biden">Joe Biden</a> and voted for the first time during the <a href="/wiki/2020_presidential_election" class="mw-redirect" title="2020 presidential election">2020 presidential election</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-343" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-343">&#91;343&#93;</a></sup>
</p><p>O'Neal turned down a $40 million deal with Reebok after hearing a mother complain about how expensive his shoes were.<sup id="cite_ref-344" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-344">&#91;344&#93;</a></sup>
</p><p>In July 2023 O’Neal purchased his first private jet; a $27 million <a href="/wiki/Bombardier_Challenger_600_series" title="Bombardier Challenger 600 series">Bombardier Challenger 650</a>, complete with the iconic “Dunkman” logo on the tail.<sup id="cite_ref-345" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-345">&#91;345&#93;</a></sup>
</p>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Awards_and_honors">Awards and honors</span></h2>
<figure class="mw-halign-right" typeof="mw:File/Thumb"><a href="/wiki/File:Shaq_at_the_white_house.jpg" class="mw-file-description"><img src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/4/41/Shaq_at_the_white_house.jpg/250px-Shaq_at_the_white_house.jpg" decoding="async" width="250" height="180" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/4/41/Shaq_at_the_white_house.jpg/375px-Shaq_at_the_white_house.jpg 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/4/41/Shaq_at_the_white_house.jpg/500px-Shaq_at_the_white_house.jpg 2x" data-file-width="600" data-file-height="433" /></a><figcaption>O'Neal and the rest of the Lakers with President <a href="/wiki/George_W._Bush" title="George W. Bush">George W. Bush</a> in the White House at a ceremony in early 2002 commemorating the team's 2001 NBA Championship</figcaption></figure>
<p><b>NBA</b>
</p>
<ul><li>Four-time <a href="/wiki/NBA_Champion" class="mw-redirect" title="NBA Champion">NBA Champion</a></li>
<li>Three-time <a href="/wiki/NBA_Finals_MVP" class="mw-redirect" title="NBA Finals MVP">NBA Finals MVP</a></li>
<li>2000 <a href="/wiki/NBA_MVP" class="mw-redirect" title="NBA MVP">NBA MVP</a></li>
<li>15-time <a href="/wiki/NBA_All-Star" class="mw-redirect" title="NBA All-Star">NBA All-Star</a></li>
<li>Three-time <a href="/wiki/NBA_All-Star_Game_MVP" class="mw-redirect" title="NBA All-Star Game MVP">NBA All-Star Game MVP</a></li>
<li>Eight-time <a href="/wiki/All-NBA_First_Team" class="mw-redirect" title="All-NBA First Team">All-NBA First Team</a></li>
<li>Two-time <a href="/wiki/All-NBA_Second_Team" class="mw-redirect" title="All-NBA Second Team">All-NBA Second Team</a></li>
<li>Four-time <a href="/wiki/All-NBA_Third_Team" class="mw-redirect" title="All-NBA Third Team">All-NBA Third Team</a></li>
<li>Three-time <a href="/wiki/NBA_All-Defensive_Second_Team" class="mw-redirect" title="NBA All-Defensive Second Team">NBA All-Defensive Second Team</a></li>
<li>1993 <a href="/wiki/NBA_Rookie_of_the_Year" class="mw-redirect" title="NBA Rookie of the Year">NBA Rookie of the Year</a></li>
<li>1993 <a href="/wiki/NBA_All-Rookie_First_Team" class="mw-redirect" title="NBA All-Rookie First Team">NBA All-Rookie First Team</a></li>
<li>Two-time <a href="/wiki/NBA_scoring_champion" class="mw-redirect" title="NBA scoring champion">NBA scoring champion</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/NBA_50th_Anniversary_Team" class="mw-redirect" title="NBA 50th Anniversary Team">NBA 50th Anniversary Team</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/NBA_75th_Anniversary_Team" title="NBA 75th Anniversary Team">NBA 75th Anniversary Team</a></li>
<li>Number 32 retired by the <a href="/wiki/Miami_Heat" title="Miami Heat">Miami Heat</a></li>
<li>Number 34 retired by the <a href="/wiki/Los_Angeles_Lakers" title="Los Angeles Lakers">Los Angeles Lakers</a></li></ul>
<p><b>USA Basketball</b>
</p>
<ul><li>1996 <a href="/wiki/Olympic_Gold_Medal" class="mw-redirect" title="Olympic Gold Medal">Olympic Gold Medal</a></li>
<li>1994 <a href="/wiki/FIBA_World_Cup" class="mw-redirect" title="FIBA World Cup">FIBA World Cup</a></li>
<li>1994 <a href="/wiki/FIBA_Basketball_World_Cup_Most_Valuable_Player" title="FIBA Basketball World Cup Most Valuable Player">FIBA World Cup MVP</a></li>
<li>1994 <a href="/wiki/USA_Basketball_Male_Athlete_of_the_Year" title="USA Basketball Male Athlete of the Year">USA Basketball Male Athlete of the Year</a></li></ul>
<p><b>NCAA</b>
</p>
<ul><li>1991 <a href="/wiki/Adolph_Rupp_Trophy" title="Adolph Rupp Trophy">Adolph Rupp Trophy</a> winner</li>
<li>Two-time Consensus <a href="/wiki/NCAA_Men%27s_Basketball_All-Americans" title="NCAA Men&#39;s Basketball All-Americans">All-American</a></li>
<li>Number 33 retired by the <a href="/wiki/LSU_Tigers_basketball#Retired_numbers" class="mw-redirect" title="LSU Tigers basketball">LSU Tigers</a></li></ul>
<p><b>Media</b>
</p>
<ul><li>1991 <a href="/wiki/Associated_Press_College_Basketball_Player_of_the_Year" title="Associated Press College Basketball Player of the Year">Associated Press Player of the Year</a></li>
<li>1991 <a href="/wiki/UPI_College_Basketball_Player_of_the_Year" title="UPI College Basketball Player of the Year">UPI Player of the Year</a></li>
<li>2005 <a href="/wiki/Black_Entertainment_Television" class="mw-redirect" title="Black Entertainment Television">BET</a> Sportsman of the Year</li></ul>
<p><b>Sports Emmy Awards</b>
</p>
<ul><li>2012 – Outstanding Promotional Announcement</li></ul>
<p><b>Academy Awards</b>
</p>
<ul><li>2022 – Short Subject Documentary (as an executive producer of <i><a href="/wiki/The_Queen_of_Basketball" title="The Queen of Basketball">The Queen of Basketball</a></i>)<sup id="cite_ref-346" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-346">&#91;346&#93;</a></sup></li></ul>
<p><b>Halls of Fame</b>
</p>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Naismith_Memorial_Hall_of_Fame" class="mw-redirect" title="Naismith Memorial Hall of Fame">Naismith Memorial Hall of Fame</a> (2016)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/College_Basketball_Hall_of_Fame" class="mw-redirect" title="College Basketball Hall of Fame">College Basketball Hall of Fame</a> (2014)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/FIBA_Hall_of_Fame" title="FIBA Hall of Fame">FIBA Hall of Fame</a> (2017)</li></ul>

<figure class="mw-default-size" typeof="mw:File/Thumb"><a href="/wiki/File:DJ_Diesel_-_June_2023_-_Sarah_Stierch_01.jpg" class="mw-file-description"><img src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/26/DJ_Diesel_-_June_2023_-_Sarah_Stierch_01.jpg/220px-DJ_Diesel_-_June_2023_-_Sarah_Stierch_01.jpg" decoding="async" width="220" height="165" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/26/DJ_Diesel_-_June_2023_-_Sarah_Stierch_01.jpg/330px-DJ_Diesel_-_June_2023_-_Sarah_Stierch_01.jpg 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/26/DJ_Diesel_-_June_2023_-_Sarah_Stierch_01.jpg/440px-DJ_Diesel_-_June_2023_-_Sarah_Stierch_01.jpg 2x" data-file-width="4032" data-file-height="3024" /></a><figcaption>O'Neal performing at the <a href="/wiki/2023_Toyota/Save_Mart_350" title="2023 Toyota/Save Mart 350">2023 Toyota/Save Mart 350</a>.</figcaption></figure>

</li>
<li id="cite_note-42"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-42">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1133582631"><cite id="CITEREFO&#39;Neal2002" class="citation book cs1">O'Neal, Shaquille (2002). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://books.google.com/books?id=cIXaWfTsc5YC&amp;pg=PA52"><i>Shaq Talks Back</i></a>. <a href="/wiki/St._Martin%27s_Paperbacks" class="mw-redirect" title="St. Martin&#39;s Paperbacks">St. Martin's Paperbacks</a>. p.&#160;52. <a href="/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="ISBN (identifier)">ISBN</a>&#160;<a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/978-0-312-98259-1" title="Special:BookSources/978-0-312-98259-1"><bdi>978-0-312-98259-1</bdi></a><span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">November 7,</span> 2010</span>. <q>We just didn't respect him. Sometimes he went from nice to hardcore and people were looking around, like, 'This ain't the guy we know.'<span class="cs1-kern-right"></span></q></cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=Shaq+Talks+Back&amp;rft.pages=52&amp;rft.pub=St.+Martin%27s+Paperbacks&amp;rft.date=2002&amp;rft.isbn=978-0-312-98259-1&amp;rft.aulast=O%27Neal&amp;rft.aufirst=Shaquille&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com%2Fbooks%3Fid%3DcIXaWfTsc5YC%26pg%3DPA52&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AShaquille+O%27Neal" class="Z3988"></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-43"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-43">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1133582631"><cite id="CITEREFO&#39;Neal2002" class="citation book cs1">O'Neal, Shaquille (2002). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://books.google.com/books?id=cIXaWfTsc5YC&amp;pg=PA151"><i>Shaq Talks Back</i></a>. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">November 9,</span> 2010</span>. <q>The 76ers trailed from the second quarter on and missed their one and only chance to tie the game when Allen Iverson could make only one of two free throws with 2:06 left – 15 seconds after O'Neal drew his sixth foul for backing over Dikembe Mutombo.</q></cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Amarillo+Globe-News&amp;rft.atitle=Lakers+hold+off+Sixers%2C+96%E2%80%9391&amp;rft.date=2001-06-11&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Famarillo.com%2Fstories%2F2001%2F06%2F11%2Fspo_nbafinals.shtml&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AShaquille+O%27Neal" class="Z3988"></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-brown-59"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-brown_59-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-brown_59-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-brown_59-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-brown_59-3"><sup><i><b>d</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1133582631"><cite id="CITEREFBrown2002" class="citation news cs1">Brown, Tim (August 14, 2002). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://articles.latimes.com/print/2002/aug/14/sports/sp-shaq14">"O'Neal Surgery Is Likely"</a>. <i>Los Angeles Times</i>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20131209005657/http://articles.latimes.com/print/2002/aug/14/sports/sp-shaq14">Archived</a> from the original on December 9, 2013<span class="reference-accessdate">. <li id="cite_note-96"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-96">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1133582631"><cite class="citation news cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://sports.espn.go.com/nba/news/story?id=3314347">"Riley bothered by Shaq's criticism of Heat players, staff"</a>. <i>ESPN</i>. <li id="cite_note-100"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-100">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1133582631"><cite class="citation news cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://espn.go.com/nba/recap/_/id/290303019/phoenix-suns-vs-orlando-magic">"Magic's Van Gundy calls out Shaq for flopping"</a>. <i>ESPN</i>. Associated Press. March 3, 2009<span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">October 15,</span> 2010</span>. <q>I was shocked, seriously, shocked", Magic coach Stan Van Gundy said of O'Neal's flopping. "And very disappointed cause he knows what it's like. Let's stand up and play like men, and I think our guy did that tonight.</q></cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=ESPN&amp;rft.atitle=Magic%27s+Van+Gundy+calls+out+Shaq+for+flopping&amp;rft.date=2009-03-03&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fespn.go.com%2Fnba%2Frecap%2F_%2Fid%2F290303019%2Fphoenix-suns-vs-orlando-magic&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AShaquille+O%27Neal" class="Z3988"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-101"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-101">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1133582631"><cite id="CITEREFSheridan2009" class="citation news cs1">Sheridan, Chris (March 5, 2009). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://sports.espn.go.com/nba/news/story?id=3953133">"Shaq rips Van Gundy for flop comment"</a>. <i>ESPN</i>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20111111004110/http://sports.espn.go.com/nba/news/story?id=3953133">Archived</a> from the original on November 11, 2011<span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">November 9,</span> 2010</span>. <q><span class="cs1-kern-left"></span>"Flopping is playing like that your whole career. I was trying to take the charge, trying to get a call. It probably was a flop, but flopping is the wrong use of words. Flopping would describe his coaching", O'Neal said, steering the conversation back to Van Gundy.</q></cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=ESPN&amp;rft.atitle=Shaq+rips+Van+Gundy+for+flop+comment&amp;rft.date=2009-03-05&amp;rft.aulast=Sheridan&amp;rft.aufirst=Chris&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fsports.espn.go.com%2Fnba%2Fnews%2Fstory%3Fid%3D3953133&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AShaquille+O%27Neal" class="Z3988"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-102"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-102">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1133582631"><cite id="CITEREFMadsen2009" class="citation web cs1"><a href="/wiki/Mark_Madsen_(basketball)" title="Mark Madsen (basketball)">Madsen, Mark</a> (March 7, 2009). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20110714035737/http://www.markmadsen.com/blog/what-is-a-flop.html">"What is a flop?"</a>. <i>MarkMadsen.com</i>. Archived from <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.markmadsen.com/blog/what-is-a-flop.html">the original</a> on July 14, 2011<span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">November 9,</span> 2010</span>. <q>So, this whole commotion about whether or not Shaq's play against Dwight Howard was a flop is so funny because everyone in the league tries to flop on Shaq and Shaq never flops back.</q></cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.jtitle=MarkMadsen.com&amp;rft.atitle=What+is+a+flop%3F&amp;rft.date=2009-03-07&amp;rft.aulast=Madsen&amp;rft.aufirst=Mark&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.markmadsen.com%2Fblog%2Fwhat-is-a-flop.html&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AShaquille+O%27Neal" class="Z3988"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-103"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-103">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1133582631"><cite id="CITEREFGregory2006" class="citation news cs1">Gregory, Sean (October 30, 2006). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20101130190946/http://www.time.com/time/magazine/article/0,9171,1552051,00.html">"10 Questions for Shaquille O'Neal"</a>. <i>Time</i>. Archived from <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.time.com/time/magazine/article/0,9171,1552051,00.html">the original</a> on November 30, 2010<span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">November 9,</span> 2010</span>. <q>Make a guy have to beat a guy—not flop and get calls and be nice to the referees and kiss ass.</q></cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Time&amp;rft.atitle=10+Questions+for+Shaquille+O%27Neal&amp;rft.date=2006-10-30&amp;rft.aulast=Gregory&amp;rft.aufirst=Sean&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.time.com%2Ftime%2Fmagazine%2Farticle%2F0%2C9171%2C1552051%2C00.html&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AShaquille+O%27Neal" class="Z3988"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-104"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-104">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1133582631"><cite id="CITEREFFriedman2009" class="citation web cs1">Friedman, Jason (March 6, 2009). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.nba.com/rockets/news/Shaq_and_Yao_Sound_Off_On_What-303812-34.html">"Clash Of The Titans"</a>. <i>Rockets.com</i>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20101117070617/http://www.nba.com/rockets/news/Shaq_and_Yao_Sound_Off_On_What-303812-34.html">Archived</a> from the original on November 17, 2010<span class="reference-accessdate">. <li id="cite_note-macmullan_20100927-120"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-macmullan_20100927_120-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-macmullan_20100927_120-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1133582631"><cite id="CITEREFMacMullan2010" class="citation web cs1"><a href="/wiki/Jackie_MacMullan" title="Jackie MacMullan">MacMullan, Jackie</a> (September 27, 2010). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://sports.espn.go.com/boston/nba/columns/story?columnist=macmullan_jackie&amp;id=5620537">"Shaq ready to leave mark in Boston"</a>. <i>ESPN</i><span class="reference-accessdate">. <li id="cite_note-164"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-164">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1133582631"><cite id="CITEREFTim_Povtak2002" class="citation web cs1">Tim Povtak (November 5, 2002). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20120606230641/http://articles.orlandosentinel.com/2002-11-05/sports/0211050282_1_sacramento-kings-christie-lakers">"Kings Come Out Fighting"</a>. <i>Orlando Sentinel</i>. <li id="cite_note-168"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-168">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1133582631"><cite id="CITEREFGuillermo2003" class="citation news cs1"><a href="/wiki/Emil_Guillermo" title="Emil Guillermo">Guillermo, Emil</a> (January 14, 2003). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20171030203034/http://articles.sfgate.com/2003-01-14/news/17470622_1_yao-ming-birthday-party-asian-american-studies">"Shaq's Apology Not Good Enough"</a>. <i>San Francisco Chronicle</i>. <li id="cite_note-:0-301"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-:0_301-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-:0_301-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1133582631"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://law.justia.com/cases/florida/third-district-court-of-appeal/2021/3d19-1645.html">"SHAQUILLE O'NEAL, vs SHAWN DARLING AND MENACHEM MAYBERG"</a>. <i>Justia Law</i><span class="reference-accessdate">. </li>
<li id="cite_note-HARTMAN-302"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-HARTMAN_302-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-HARTMAN_302-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-HARTMAN_302-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1133582631"><cite id="CITEREFHARTMAN2014" class="citation web cs1">HARTMAN, MADISON (August 2014). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.nydailynews.com/sports/basketball/shaq-sued-man-mocked-instagram-article-1.1888337">"Ex-NBA star Shaquille O'Neal, two others being sued by man with rare genetic disease who was mocked via social media"</a>. <i>New York Daily News</i><span class="reference-accessdate">. class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible mw-collapsed navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2"><link href="/wiki/Template_talk:Associated_Press_College_Basketball_Player_of_the_Year" title="Template talk:Associated Press College Basketball Player of the Year"><abbr title="Discuss this template" href="/wiki/Associated_Press_College_Basketball_Player_of_the_Year" title="Associated Press College Basketball Player of the Year">Associated Press Men's College Basketball Player of the Year</a></div></th></tr><tr><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li><span class="nowrap">1961: <a href="/wiki/Jerry_Lucas" title="Jerry Lucas">Lucas</a></span></li>

<div class="navbox-styles"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1129693374"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1061467846"></div><div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="UPI_College_Basketball_Player_of_the_Year_Award_winners" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible mw-collapsed navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1129693374"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349"><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:UPI_College_Basketball_Player_of_the_Year" title="Template:UPI College Basketball Player of the Year"><abbr title="View this template" style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:UPI_College_Basketball_Player_of_the_Year" title="Template talk:UPI College Basketball Player of the Year"><abbr title="Discuss this template" style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:UPI_College_Basketball_Player_of_the_Year&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template" style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="UPI_College_Basketball_Player_of_the_Year_Award_winners" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/UPI_College_Basketball_Player_of_the_Year" title="UPI College Basketball Player of the Year">UPI College Basketball Player of the Year Award</a> winners</div></th></tr><tr><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">

href="/wiki/1996_United_States_men%27s_Olympic_basketball_team" title="1996 United States men&#39;s Olympic basketball team"><span style="color:#FFFFFF">United States men's basketball squad</span></a> – <a href="/wiki/Basketball_at_the_1996_Summer_Olympics_%E2%80%93_Men%27s_tournament" title="Basketball at the 1996 Summer Olympics – Men&#39;s tournament"><span style="color:#FFFFFF">1996 Summer Olympics – Gold medal</span></a></div></th></tr><tr><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li>4&#160;<span class="vcard agent"><span class="fn"><a href="/wiki/Charles_Barkley" title="Charles Barkley">Barkley</a></span></span></li>
<li>5&#160;<span class="vcard agent"><span class="fn"><a href="/wiki/Grant_Hill" title="Grant Hill">Hill</a></span></span></li>

</div></td><td class="noviewer navbox-image" rowspan="1" style="width:1px;padding:0 0 0 2px"><div><span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/United_States" title="United States"><img alt="United States" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/a/a4/Flag_of_the_United_States.svg/50px-Flag_of_the_United_States.svg.png" decoding="async" width="50" height="26" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/a/a4/Flag_of_the_United_States.svg/75px-Flag_of_the_United_States.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/a/a4/Flag_of_the_United_States.svg/100px-Flag_of_the_United_States.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1235" data-file-height="650" /></a></span></span></div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div class="navbox-styles"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1129693374"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1061467846"></div><div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="FIBA_World_Cup_Most_Valuable_Player_Award" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks hlist mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2" style="background:black; color:#dbc068; box-shadow: inset 1px 1px 0 #dbc068, inset -1px -1px 0 #dbc068;"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1129693374"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349"><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:FIBA_Basketball_World_Cup_MVP_Award" title="Template:FIBA Basketball World Cup MVP Award"><abbr title="View this template" style="background:black; <div class="navbox-styles"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1129693374"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1061467846"></div><div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="NBA_All-Star_Game_Kobe_Bryant_Most_Valuable_Player_Award" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1129693374"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349"><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:NBA_All-Star_Game_MVP_Award" title="Template:NBA All-Star Game MVP Award"><abbr title="View this template" style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:NBA_All-Star_Game_MVP_Award" title="Template talk:NBA All-Star Game MVP Award"><abbr title="Discuss this template" style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:NBA_All-Star_Game_MVP_Award&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template" style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="NBA_All-Star_Game_Kobe_Bryant_Most_Valuable_Player_Award" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/NBA_All-Star_Game_Kobe_Bryant_Most_Valuable_Player_Award" title="NBA All-Star Game Kobe Bryant Most Valuable Player Award">NBA All-Star Game Kobe Bryant Most Valuable Player Award</a></div></th></tr><tr><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">

<div class="navbox-styles"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1129693374"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1061467846"></div><div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="NBA_Most_Valuable_Player_Award" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1129693374"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349"><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:NBA_MVPs" title="Template:NBA MVPs"><abbr title="View this template" style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:NBA_MVPs" title="Template talk:NBA MVPs"><abbr title="Discuss this template" style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:NBA_MVPs&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template" style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="NBA_Most_Valuable_Player_Award" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/NBA_Most_Valuable_Player_Award" title="NBA Most Valuable Player Award">NBA Most Valuable Player Award</a></div></th></tr><tr><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li><span class="nowrap">1956: <a href="/wiki/Bob_Pettit" title="Bob Pettit">Pettit</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1957: <a href="/wiki/Bob_Cousy" title="Bob Cousy">Cousy</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1958: <a href="/wiki/Bill_Russell" title="Bill Russell">Russell</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1959: <a href="/wiki/Bob_Pettit" title="Bob Pettit">Pettit</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1960: <a href="/wiki/Wilt_Chamberlain" title="Wilt Chamberlain">Chamberlain</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1961: <a href="/wiki/Bill_Russell" title="Bill Russell">Russell</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1962: <a href="/wiki/Bill_Russell" title="Bill Russell">Russell</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1963: <a href="/wiki/Bill_Russell" title="Bill Russell">Russell</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1964: <a href="/wiki/Oscar_Robertson" title="Oscar Robertson">Robertson</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1965: <a href="/wiki/Bill_Russell" title="Bill Russell">Russell</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1966: <a href="/wiki/Wilt_Chamberlain" title="Wilt Chamberlain">Chamberlain</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1967: <a href="/wiki/Wilt_Chamberlain" title="Wilt Chamberlain">Chamberlain</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1968: <a href="/wiki/Wilt_Chamberlain" title="Wilt Chamberlain">Chamberlain</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1969: <a href="/wiki/Wes_Unseld" title="Wes Unseld">Unseld</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1970: <a href="/wiki/Willis_Reed" title="Willis Reed">Reed</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1971: <a href="/wiki/Kareem_Abdul-Jabbar" title="Kareem Abdul-Jabbar">Alcindor</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1972: <a href="/wiki/Kareem_Abdul-Jabbar" title="Kareem Abdul-Jabbar">Abdul-Jabbar</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1973: <a href="/wiki/Dave_Cowens" title="Dave Cowens">Cowens</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1974: <a href="/wiki/Kareem_Abdul-Jabbar" title="Kareem Abdul-Jabbar">Abdul-Jabbar</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1975: <a href="/wiki/Bob_McAdoo" title="Bob McAdoo">McAdoo</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1976: <a href="/wiki/Kareem_Abdul-Jabbar" title="Kareem Abdul-Jabbar">Abdul-Jabbar</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1977: <a href="/wiki/Kareem_Abdul-Jabbar" title="Kareem Abdul-Jabbar">Abdul-Jabbar</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1978: <a href="/wiki/Bill_Walton" title="Bill Walton">Walton</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">1984: <a href="/wiki/Larry_Bird" title="Larry Bird">Bird</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1985: <a href="/wiki/Larry_Bird" title="Larry Bird">Bird</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">1988: <a href="/wiki/Michael_Jordan" title="Michael Jordan">Jordan</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1989: <a href="/wiki/Magic_Johnson" title="Magic Johnson">Johnson</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">2000: <a class="mw-selflink selflink">O'Neal</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2001: <a href="/wiki/Allen_Iverson" title="Allen Iverson">Iverson</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2002: <a href="/wiki/Tim_Duncan" title="Tim Duncan">Duncan</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">2004: <a href="/wiki/Kevin_Garnett" title="Kevin Garnett">Garnett</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">2010: <a href="/wiki/LeBron_James" title="LeBron James">James</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">2014: <a href="/wiki/Kevin_Durant" title="Kevin Durant">Durant</a></span></li>

</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div class="navbox-styles"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1129693374"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1061467846"></div><div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="NBA_Finals_Bill_Russell_Most_Valuable_Player_Award" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1129693374"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349"><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:NBA_Finals_MVPs" title="Template:NBA Finals MVPs"><abbr title="View this template" style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:NBA_Finals_MVPs" title="Template talk:NBA Finals MVPs"><abbr title="Discuss this template" style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:NBA_Finals_MVPs&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template" style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="NBA_Finals_Bill_Russell_Most_Valuable_Player_Award" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/NBA_Finals_Most_Valuable_Player_Award" title="NBA Finals Most Valuable Player Award">NBA Finals Bill Russell Most Valuable Player Award</a></div></th></tr><tr><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">

<div class="navbox-styles"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1129693374"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1061467846"></div><div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="NBA_Rookie_of_the_Year_Award" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1129693374"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349"><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:NBA_Rookies_of_the_Year" title="Template:NBA Rookies of the Year"><abbr title="View this template" style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:NBA_Rookies_of_the_Year" title="Template talk:NBA Rookies of the Year"><abbr title="Discuss this template" style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:NBA_Rookies_of_the_Year&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template" style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="NBA_Rookie_of_the_Year_Award" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/NBA_Rookie_of_the_Year_Award" title="NBA Rookie of the Year Award">NBA Rookie of the Year Award</a></div></th></tr><tr><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li><span class="nowrap">1953: <a href="/wiki/Don_Meineke" title="Don Meineke">Meineke</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1954: <a href="/wiki/Ray_Felix" title="Ray Felix">Felix</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">1967: <a href="/wiki/Dave_Bing" title="Dave Bing">Bing</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1968: <a href="/wiki/Earl_Monroe" title="Earl Monroe">Monroe</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1969: <a href="/wiki/Wes_Unseld" title="Wes Unseld">Unseld</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1970: <a href="/wiki/Kareem_Abdul-Jabbar" title="Kareem Abdul-Jabbar">Alcindor</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1971: <a href="/wiki/Dave_Cowens" title="Dave Cowens">Cowens</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Geoff_Petrie" title="Geoff Petrie">Petrie</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">1978: <a href="/wiki/Walter_Davis_(basketball)" title="Walter Davis (basketball)">Davis</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1979: <a href="/wiki/Phil_Ford_(basketball)" title="Phil Ford (basketball)">Ford</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1980: <a href="/wiki/Larry_Bird" title="Larry Bird">Bird</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">1982: <a href="/wiki/Buck_Williams" title="Buck Williams">Williams</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1983: <a href="/wiki/Terry_Cummings" title="Terry Cummings">Cummings</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1984: <a href="/wiki/Ralph_Sampson" title="Ralph Sampson">Sampson</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1985: <a href="/wiki/Michael_Jordan" title="Michael Jordan">Jordan</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1986: <a href="/wiki/Patrick_Ewing" title="Patrick Ewing">Ewing</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">1988: <a href="/wiki/Mark_Jackson" title="Mark Jackson">Jackson</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">1990: <a href="/wiki/David_Robinson" title="David Robinson">Robinson</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1991: <a href="/wiki/Derrick_Coleman" title="Derrick Coleman">Coleman</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">1993: <a class="mw-selflink selflink">O'Neal</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1994: <a href="/wiki/Chris_Webber" title="Chris Webber">Webber</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1995: <a href="/wiki/Grant_Hill" title="Grant Hill">Hill</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Jason_Kidd" title="Jason Kidd">Kidd</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1996: <a href="/wiki/Damon_Stoudamire" title="Damon Stoudamire">Stoudamire</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1997: <a href="/wiki/Allen_Iverson" title="Allen Iverson">Iverson</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">2002: <a href="/wiki/Pau_Gasol" title="Pau Gasol">Gasol</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2003: <a href="/wiki/Amar%27e_Stoudemire" title="Amar&#39;e Stoudemire">Stoudemire</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2004: <a href="/wiki/LeBron_James" title="LeBron James">James</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2005: <a href="/wiki/Emeka_Okafor" title="Emeka Okafor">Okafor</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2006: <a href="/wiki/Chris_Paul" title="Chris Paul">Paul</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2007: <a href="/wiki/Brandon_Roy" title="Brandon Roy">Roy</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2008: <a href="/wiki/Kevin_Durant" title="Kevin Durant">Durant</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2009: <a href="/wiki/Derrick_Rose" title="Derrick Rose">Rose</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2010: <a href="/wiki/Tyreke_Evans" title="Tyreke Evans">Evans</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2011: <a href="/wiki/Blake_Griffin" title="Blake Griffin">Griffin</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2012: <a href="/wiki/Kyrie_Irving" title="Kyrie Irving">Irving</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2013: <a href="/wiki/Damian_Lillard" title="Damian Lillard">Lillard</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2014: <a href="/wiki/Michael_Carter-Williams" title="Michael Carter-Williams">Carter-Williams</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2015: <a href="/wiki/Andrew_Wiggins" title="Andrew Wiggins">Wiggins</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2016: <a href="/wiki/Karl-Anthony_Towns" title="Karl-Anthony Towns">Towns</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2017: <a href="/wiki/Malcolm_Brogdon" title="Malcolm Brogdon">Brogdon</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2018: <a href="/wiki/Ben_Simmons" title="Ben Simmons">Simmons</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2019: <a href="/wiki/Luka_Don%C4%8Di%C4%87" title="Luka Dončić">Dončić</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2020: <a href="/wiki/Ja_Morant" title="Ja Morant">Morant</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2021: <a href="/wiki/LaMelo_Ball" title="LaMelo Ball">Ball</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2022: <a href="/wiki/Scottie_Barnes" title="Scottie Barnes">Barnes</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2023: <a href="/wiki/Paolo_Banchero" title="Paolo Banchero">Banchero</a></span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div class="navbox-styles"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1129693374"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1061467846"></div><div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="NBA_annual_scoring_leaders" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1129693374"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349"><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:NBA_scoring_leaders" title="Template:NBA scoring leaders"><abbr title="View this template" style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:NBA_scoring_leaders" title="Template talk:NBA scoring leaders"><abbr title="Discuss this template" style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:NBA_scoring_leaders&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template" style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="NBA_annual_scoring_leaders" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/List_of_National_Basketball_Association_annual_scoring_leaders" title="List of National Basketball Association annual scoring leaders">NBA annual scoring leaders</a></div></th></tr><tr><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">

<div class="navbox-styles"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1129693374"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1061467846"></div><div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="NBA_50th_Anniversary_Team" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1129693374"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349"><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:NBA50" title="Template:NBA50"><abbr title="View this template" style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:NBA50" title="Template talk:NBA50"><abbr title="Discuss this template" style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:NBA50&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template" style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="NBA_50th_Anniversary_Team" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/50_Greatest_Players_in_NBA_History" title="50 Greatest Players in NBA History">NBA 50th Anniversary Team</a></div></th></tr><tr><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Kareem_Abdul-Jabbar" title="Kareem Abdul-Jabbar">Kareem Abdul-Jabbar</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Nate_Archibald" title="Nate Archibald">Nate Archibald</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Paul_Arizin" title="Paul Arizin">Paul Arizin</a></li>

<li><a href="/wiki/Billy_Cunningham" title="Billy Cunningham">Billy Cunningham</a></li>

<ul><li><span class="noviewer" typeof="mw:File"><span title="Category"><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/9/96/Symbol_category_class.svg/16px-Symbol_category_class.svg.png" decoding="async" width="16" height="16" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/9/96/Symbol_category_class.svg/23px-Symbol_category_class.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/9/96/Symbol_category_class.svg/31px-Symbol_category_class.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="180" data-file-height="185" /></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Category:Miami_Heat" title="Category:Miami Heat"><span style="color:#FFFFFF">Category</span></a></li>
<li><span class="noviewer" typeof="mw:File"><span title="Commons page"><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/4a/Commons-logo.svg/12px-Commons-logo.svg.png" decoding="async" width="12" height="16" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/4a/Commons-logo.svg/18px-Commons-logo.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/4a/Commons-logo.svg/24px-Commons-logo.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1024" data-file-height="1376" /></span></span> <a href="https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Category:Miami_Heat" class="extiw" title="commons:Category:Miami Heat"><span style="color:#FFFFFF">Commons</span></a></li></ul>
</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
